message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,500. It's a great deal for you as it's worth $15,000 to you.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of something more in the range of $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think that's the maximum I can go.
Bob, I understand your position, but $13,000 is still a bit low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $13,500. That's a good price for both of us.  Let's see if we can close this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $13,250. Can you consider that?
